updates_adblockBrowser.message: If you are taking control on desktop, you can block ads and improve your privacy and security on mobile too. Get the Adblock Browser App below.

updates_blockAds.message: The Open Source Rebel Alliance created new blocking filters that let you blast hidden ads on websites like Facebook, even if the Empire strikes back.

updates_optionsPageNews.message: Brand new Settings page - revamped and restyled with more privacy and security options - so it's easier to customize Adblock Plus just like you want it.

updates_phone.message: But wait! What about your phone?
